pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:5.1: 61. The training rule on pregnant women
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:6.2: At that time the nuns gave the full ordination to a woman who was pregnant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:6.5: “Give almsfood to the nun. She’s carrying a heavy burden.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:7.2: “How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is pregnant?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.2: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.3: “How can nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is pregnant?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.7: How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is pregnant?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:8.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:9.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a woman who is pregnant, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:10.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:12.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:12.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:12.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:12.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:12.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.1: If she is pregnant, and she perceives her as pregnant, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.2: If she is pregnant, but she is unsure if she is, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.3: If she is pregnant, but she does not perceive her as pregnant, and she gives her the full ordination, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.4: If she is not pregnant, but she perceives her as pregnant, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.5: If she is not pregnant, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:13.6: If she is not pregnant, and she does not perceive her as pregnant, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:14.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:15.1: The first training rule is finished.
